sentences.sentence: She has set out to seduce Stephen.
In Greek mythology, the god Zeus took the form of a swan to seduce Leda.
sentences.translation: 在希腊神话中，主神宙斯用天鹅之形引诱勒达。

sentences.sentence: According to college folklore, a well turned essay has the power to seduce an admissions committee.
sentences.translation: 根据大学里的民间传说，一篇优秀的文章能够吸引招生委员会。
